class_description: These constants are used by the urls(for:in:) and url(for:in:appropriateFor:create:) methods of FileManager.

params.param_description: An initial value for the structure composed as the bitwise OR of zero or more of the valid values.

Methods.method_description: Creates a search path domain mask.

Vars.var_description: The user’s home directory—the place to install user’s personal items (~).
The place to install items available to everyone on this machine.
The place to install items available on the network (/Network).
A directory for system files provided by Apple (/System) .
